name: Vietnamese Chayote Squash Soup with Pork Meatballs (Canh Su Su Nấu Giò Sống/Canh Mọc)
description: A traditional soup that is easy to make, featuring two main ingredients, chayote squash, and store-bought ground pork paste. Its light and flavorful broth pairs beautifully with steamed rice, making it an ideal accompaniment to other side dishes for a complete family-style meal.
keywords: vietnamese soup, vietnamese canh, how to make vietnamese soup, how to make vietnamese canh, chayote squash recipe, pork meatballs, easy soup recipe, traditional vietnamese dish, steamed rice, quick family meal, Vietnamese cooking, simple pork recipe, canh su su nau gio song, canh su su nau moc, canh su su, canh moc, canh gio song, canh su su nấu giò sống, canh su su nấu mọc, canh mọc, traditional vietnamese home cooking, vietnamese home cooking, chayote recipe

video.name: Vietnamese Chayote Squash Soup with Pork Meatballs (Canh Su Su Nấu Giò Sống)
video.description: Vietnamese Chayote Squash Soup with Pork Meatballs (Canh Su Su Nấu Giò Sống)

recipeIngredient: Store-bought container of Vietnamese pork paste (gio song)
recipeInstructions: In a medium pot, heat oil on medium-high. Add garlic and shallot. Sauté until fragrant (about 30 seconds).
Add water and bring the pot to a boil.
Add chayote and cook on a low simmer for 10 minutes.
Scoop pork paste into small balls and drop directly into the pot. Add as much or as little as you like. Continue to cook for 5 minutes.
Season soup to taste with sugar, fish sauce, sea salt, and MSG.
Garnish with cilantro/green onions and a sprinkle of ground black pepper when ready to serve.
